title: In ESA. was it Black GEL or BALL pen?

comments.body: Ball, but they don't care if it's gel...only needs to be black

In reality, it doesn't matter if its blue, black or rainbow colored since after scanning its all black and white lol. But I would recommend using a black ball pen since the scans come clearer with it.
They say black ball ðŸ˜” - but I used gel for all ESA and ISA tbh gel smoother and faster to write with.
